title: panic: leveldb: internal key "lz\x04\xb4\x90", len=5: invalid length
body:
#### System information

Geth version: 1.10.26-stable
CL client & version: prysm@v3.2.0
OS & Version: Linux

#### Expected behaviour
for my node to sync

#### Actual behaviour
crashes. since its a service it restarts, but then it keeps crashing and restarting nonstop

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
not sure

#### Backtrace


any help would be really appreciated
